name: Magi of King's Wood
description:
PICO-8 Controls:

  • [X] to attack
  • [O] to shoot
  • Left and Right to move
  • Up to Jump and Float
  • Down to block (grounded only)

Keyboard controls:

Player1: 

  • Arrows keys to move
  • M to attack [X]
  • N to shoot [O]

Player2: 

  • ESDF to move
  • Q to attack [X]
  • W to shoot [O]
